<details>
          <summary>MCP tool call</summary>
      
*Called tool*: playwright - browser_take_screenshot: Take a screenshot of the current page. You can't perform actions based on the screenshot, use browser_snapshot for actions.

*Parameters*:
  * filename: localhost-3000.png
  * fullPage: true

*Result*:
### Result
Took the full page screenshot and saved it as C:\Users\Robin\AppData\Local\Temp\playwright-mcp-output\1759514188450\localhost-3000.png

### Ran Playwright code
```js
// Screenshot full page and save it as C:\Users\Robin\AppData\Local\Temp\playwright-mcp-output\1759514188450\localhost-3000.png
await page.screenshot({
fullPage: true,
  path: 'C:\\Users\\Robin\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\playwright-mcp-output\\1759514188450\\localhost-3000.png',
  scale: 'css',
  type: 'png'
});
```
